transcript:
Customer: Hello.
Hanji, good afternoon sir.
Customer: Han, good afternoon boliye.
Executive: Sir, ye aapko na wahi pe whatsapp ke waha pe call aur mail karna padega customer care pe. Idhar se IndiaMART ki taraf se aapko koi wo kuch nahi hai.
Customer: Yaha pe to maine mail kara hai but abhi tak open nahi ho raha hai.
Executive: Wo thodi der mein jab jyada ho jata hai na to ho jata hai block wo normal hai. But unhi ki taraf se wo activate hoga unhi ki taraf se block hua unhi ki taraf se activate hoga.
Customer: Achha, thik hai. Ye hone ke baad aap ek kaam kijiye. Wo ye sir ye API wala kar dijiye haan.
Executive: Konsa kar de?
Customer: Matlab wo whatsapp jo communication hota hai na API.
Executive: Haan.
Customer: Whatsapp ka jo premium hota hai premium business ke liye.
Executive: Wo sir package alag se hai.
Customer: Achha kitna ka package hai?
Executive: Ye 15000 plus GST ka ek saal ka.
Customer: Ye to bahut jyada bol raha hai jo Trade India se 75000 bataya tha.
Executive: Bol dete hai koi discount hota hai whatsapp wala chahiye aapko.
Customer: Haan haan haan.
Executive: Ek second hold kariye. Line pe rahiye. Kuch coupon pada hoga to check kar dete hai.
Executive: Ek second.

































































































Executive: Ek second sir try kar rahe hai.
Executive: Ek second line pe rahiye.
(silence)
Executive: Ek second sir matlab
Executive: Sir ek baar sir ko whatsapp wala bata dijiye line pe hi hai sir.
Customer: Hello sir. Hello sir good afternoon.
Executive: Haan boliye.
Customer: Haan sir basically whatsapp feature mein jaise hota kya hai suppose man lijiye aap koi customer hai. Thik hai customer aapke product ko search kar raha hai IndiaMART pe ya Google pe right. To uske usme jaise aapka product suppose koi bhi ABC man lijiye wooden chair mein aap deal karte hai suppose. Wooden chair aapne search kiya to agar aapki profile usko show hogi to usse ek whatsapp ka icon show hoga wo directly aapko call matlab whatsapp ke through aapko connect kar sakta hai.
Customer: Achha.
Executive: Ji matlab sidhe message matlab wo direct aap matlab apne whatsapp ke through pehle waise kya hota hai aapke lead manager pe message aata hai. Lead manager ke through aap communicate karte ho customer ko. But usme kya hoga aapke profile se sidhe customer aapke whatsapp tak pahunch jayega.
Customer: Achha.
Executive: Matlab customer ko sidhe direct inquiry karne ki koi need nahi hai usme. Matlab ek feature de diya gaya hai ki customer sidhe direct aapko whatsapp pe connect kar sakta hai.
Customer: Achha wo IndiaMART se sidha aapka.
Executive: Yes whatsapp pe chala aayega. Matlab aapki profile pe jaise suppose man lijiye aap IndiaMART pe jaise kafi sare suppliers hai competitors hai aapki profile jab usse dikhegi usse ek whatsapp ka icon dikhega wo sidhe uspe click karega then aap aapke paas sidhe wo contact kar sakta hai.
Customer: Haan.
Executive: Waise basically man lijiye aapko whatsapp ka icon suppose nahi hoga to hoga kya ki wo aapko sidhe call karega ya direct inquiry karega then aapke paas lead manager mein message aayega then aap usko communicate karenge but waha se kya hoga sidhe aapko whatsapp ka icon uske paas hoga wo whatsapp ke icon pe click karega and then aapke paas direct baat kar sakta hai aap.
Customer: Haan whatsapp ke through.
Executive: Wo to hai to ye feature pata hai aisa normal mein to whatsapp pe wo karta hai.
Customer: Ji.
Customer: To sir kitna aayega?
Executive: Uska main bata deta hu ek minute.
Executive: To uska price jo as of now chal raha hai wo 11000 plus GST chal raha hai but offer mein kuch main dekh leta hu kitna hai. Haan. Ek second humko ek banda 75000 mein bola tha thik hai. Wo wo kya hai haan. To abhi aapko abhi ye pad jayega 10000 plus GST mein pad jayega sir.
Customer: Wo to jyada ho raha hai.
Executive: Sir usme dekhiye usme kya hota hai sidhe direct customer aap aap tak reachable rahega. Dekh lijiye wo wo uske sath jaan pehchan nahi hai thik hai wo Trade India ka hai to uska service jyada din tak maine nahi liya to 6 mahina hoga thik hai isliye uske sath nahi karwaya. Haan hum IndiaMART se 3 saal se juda hai. Haan. Main aapko bata du dekhiye kisi ke main 15000 plus GST. Sir maine haan ye standard price jo hai 15000 plus GST hai fir mere paas aaya tha 11000 ka mere paas show ho raha tha maine ek aur coupon lagaya kyuki usne mere ko bola ki sir client purane hai to ek baar aap dekh lo to main apne level pe bhi ek maine voucher lagaya to ye ab final aa raha hai iska.
Customer: Dekh lijiye sir thoda jitna kam hoga kar dijiye haan aur whatsapp thik hone ke baad hi aap fast wo kaam kar dijiye haan. Matlab abhi abhi whatsapp wo band. Haan haan. Abhi whatsapp wo abhi whatsapp pe wo show ho raha hai this account can no longer use whatsapp business aisa hai. Haan kyuki waha pe abhi aapko credential mile nahi hai na aap aap jaise aap ye service le loge. Haan then aapka start ho jayega ye. Service lene ke baad start ho jayega. Ji. I am ista wale jo abhi baat kar raha hu na. Haan. Uske baad baat kar rahe hai na aap. Hmm. Haan to wo jaise aap service lete hai uski to wo icon aapki profile pe show hone lagega supplier ko. Sir customers ko. Nahi wo to abhi to mera whatsapp hi band hai. Achha whatsapp band hai. Abhi whatsapp hi band hai isliye. Achha 24 hours time lagega.

Customer: Hello.
Executive: Ji haan sir boliye. Haan whatsapp abhi band hai to kitna time lagega? Matlab whatsapp band hai matlab main samajh nahi pa raha hu kya keh rahe hai aap. Sir aapka whatsapp block ho gaya wo apni internal team se check kara dijiye wo sir ke whatsapp ke through hi aisa char panch baar hua hai thik hai but 24 ghanta ke andar wo khol gaya. Abhi 24 ghanta paar ho chuka hai. se kar do na to block ho jata hai. Haan wo jyada message ke liye hua hai. usme internal iska koi role nahi hai wo whatsapp ki taraf se sir ka whatsapp. Wo to whatsapp ki taraf se hai. Haan wo aisa yaha se koi role hi wo to jaise hi aapka clear hoga wo start ho jayega. Nahi nahi nahi to aapka wo kya service hai whatsapp ka wo premium ho raha hai na. Hello. Ji ji ji. Haan wo sir jo service ke liye bata raha hai. Thik hai. Haan ji. To kaisa service hai? Uska fayda kya kya hoga? Sir sir ek baar sir ko sara bata dijiye. Isme kya kya mil jayega sir ko. Hello. Hello. Haan sir ek baar sir ko sara bata dijiye isme kya kya benefit hai kya kya milega. Haan ista mein? Ji whatsapp ke liye. Whatsapp mein ye whatsapp mein sabse pehle main ek baar price dekh leta hu actually main price mein uska jo blue tick wo hoga na whatsapp pe blue tick. Main ek cheez main pura main information dekh leta hu actually whatsapp ka mujhe laga sir API ka main bata raha hu uska jo whatsapp ka feature hai na uska price jo hai 15000 plus GST hi hai abhi as of now. Haan. Thik hai to 15000 plus GST hi rahega aur isme features kya rahega jaise Instagram nahi chahiye whatsapp wala chahiye. Whatsapp wala chahiye na mujhe laga mujhe main confuse ho gaya mujhe API laga ki sir ko API chahiye to wahi maine abhi check kiya to isme insta insta and insta ka hai jo 15000 plus GST hai isme kya feature rahega sir main aapko bata deta hu ki aapki profile pe whatsapp ka icon rahega right wo sidhe direct aap koi bhi customer aayega koi bhi man lijiye aapka product search karega suppose that uske aapke profile pe icon hoga sidhe us icon pe click karega whatsapp pe sidhe wo aapse coordinate kar lega. Achha. Aur jo aap bata rahe hai second thing aap jo bata rahe ho whatsapp jo aapka block hai to usme koi aisa issue nahi hai wo jaise wo whatsapp ki taraf se hai aapka issue wo jaise within a 24 hours mein wo aapka clear ho jayega wo sahi ho jayega. To jaise hi wo sahi hoga apne aap char panch baar hua meri baat sun lijiye char panch baar hua haan to 24 hours ke andar ho gaya hai abhi baat 24 hours paar ho chuka hai. Haan. Achha matlab wo 30 ghanta paar ho gaya hai. Haan. To usme sir usme show kya ho raha hai aapko? Wo this account cannot no longer use whatsapp business aisa. Aur iska jo cross mark hota hai na. Haan haan. Haan. Wo actually main aapko bata du kuch technical error hi hoga whatsapp ki side se wo jaise hi on hoga aapka icon show hona start ho jayega aur suppose man lijiye in case wo on nahi hota hai to aap dusre number se agar aap banaoge na jis number se bhi aap banaoge to us number pe land ho jayega. Iska koi whatsapp ka koi issue nahi hai aap apna. Hmm. Ye mera purana number hai isme bahut bar hai number mein thik hai. Nahi example main bata raha hu pehli baat to wo aisa hoga nahi wo technical error hai wo apna apne aap thodi der matlab kuch din mein sahi ho jayega. Thik hai. Kuch din lagega? Haan ji. Matlab jyada din lagega? Nahi jyada din nahi lagega kuch technical error hai aapko whatsapp ke side se hi aa raha hoga wo sahi ho jayega sir ya to aap update kar dijiye ek baar whatsapp whatsapp business jo hai aapka play store se ek baar update kar dijiye usko. Wo update hai. Haan uninstall karke install again kar lijiye. Nahi usme bahut data hai uninstall nahi karna hoga. To usko backup leke uska achha backup aap lenge kyuki band pada hua hai. Band pada hai. Nahi wo aap dekhiye whatsapp ke side se agar aisa issue hai to wo aapka resolve ho jayega sir koi usme koi problem nahi hai wo aisa to hai nahi ki whatsapp ke side se aapko band kar denge profile. Wo on ho jata hai ki sometimes ye ek baar mere sath bhi aisa hota hai matlab do teen din tak ye band raha tha apne aap on ho gaya tha fir. Haan. Thik hai. Wo wo jo 15000 ke jo service hai. Haan. Uske andar ki blue tick mil jayega? Blue tick matlab kaisa? Matlab wo whatsapp ka jo verify blue batch hota hai tick. Sir wo to aapke paas icon aayega blue tick ka to aisa nahi hai yaha pe isme bhi sir aapke paas icon dikhega aapki profile mein whatsapp ka customer sidhe contact kar sakta hai aapko whatsapp ke through. Uska koi demo hai aapke paas kya kya milega? Haan demo hai main aapko bhej deta hu. Us number pe nahi hai ek number bata raha hu usme bhej dijiye main check karta hu. Aapko mail kar deta hu whatsapp pe bhi share kar deta hu aapko ye price 15000 plus GST rahega aur jo detail wagera hai main aapko bhej deta hu abhi thik hai. Achha haan haan. Thik hai bhej dijiye. Thik hai. Okay main bhejta hu. Quality ko thoda improve kariye. Aur aapko kuch aur issue to nahi hai na ticket aapki customer care wali close kar dete hai. Subah jo aapko number diye the na aap usi pe call kariyega sirf fir se beshak note karna hai to note kar lijiye. Haan Piyush aap apna number bhi de do mera bhi sir ko de do agar koi bhi issue hota hai sir ko to aap direct sir hamare matlab jo personal number hai unpe kar liya kariye hota kya hai na aap direct use customer care pe call karte hai to kahi na kahi aapki profile bhi hamper hoti hai. Achha. Haan. To aap aur sabse pehle ek haan number aap de do Piyush. Sir ka number hai mere paas. Haan bas usi pe call karna hai sir. Usi pe call kar lijiyega aap ye fir ticket close kar dena ab aap bhi. Haan haan. Thik hai aap sir aapke paas ek abhi feedback aayega mail pe hi usse yes kar dijiyega. Achha achha thik hai. Thik hai. Ji. Thik hai sir main abhi details bhejta hu aapke aapko. Thik hai haan. Thik hai okay. Thik hai.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer's WhatsApp is blocked.

- Inquires about WhatsApp premium package price.



Resolution:

- Executive explained WhatsApp business feature.

- Executive offered a price of ₹10,000 plus GST.

- Executive will share demo and details via mail.

- Executive provided personal contact numbers for future issues.



Next Steps: 

- Customer to provide feedback on the mail.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- whatsapp, subscription, price, block, business
